sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The magistrates authority, in matters of religion; and the souls immortality, vindicated in two sermons preach'd at York. / By Christopher Cartvvright, B.D. and Minister of Gods Word there. Cartwright, Christopher, 1602-1658. Leigh, Edward, 1602-1671.
[10], 32 p.
Printed for Tho. Underhill, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Bible in great Woodstreet., London, : 1647.
"An advertisement to the reader" and "To the Christian reader" are signed by Edward Leigh [Thomason Catalogue erroneously has "Edmund" Leigh]. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug 12". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The magistrates authority, in matters of religion; and the souls immortality, vindicated in two sermons preach'd at York. / By Christopher Cartvvright, B.D. and Minister of Gods Word there. Cartwright, Christopher, 1602-1658. Leigh, Edward, 1602-1671.
[10], 32 p.
Printed for Tho. Underhill, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Bible in great Woodstreet., London, : 1647.
"An advertisement to the reader" and "To the Christian reader" are signed by Edward Leigh [Thomason Catalogue erroneously has "Edmund" Leigh]. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug 12". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Tho. Underhill
his shop at the sign of the Bible in great Woodstreet.
